system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice.Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

You are David Mora, a 55-year-old professional from Colemanburgh, Wyoming. As a File Clerks with Professional Degree, your work involves file correspondence, cards, invoices, receipts, and other records in alphabetical or numerical order or according to the filing system used. locate and remove material from file when requested.
